question_title: Will the community prediction be higher than 40.00% on 2026-02-14 for the Metaculus question "Will there be a bilateral ceasefire in the Russo-Ukrainian conflict before 2027?"?
summary: Meta-prediction with CP exactly at 40% threshold. Abu Dhabi trilateral talks (Feb 4-5) will generate news before the Feb 14 resolution. Energy ceasefire and diplomatic momentum are positive signals, but territorial deadlock persists and Manifold markets (36.5%) are below Metaculus. Large forecaster base (874) is slow to move. Effectively a coin flip with slight downward pressure from market signals.

factors.description: Abu Dhabi trilateral talks happening Feb 4-5 could generate positive headlines that nudge CP upward
Energy ceasefire being largely observed shows some cooperation momentum
Manifold markets at 36.5%, below Metaculus 40% - suggests possible downward drift
Territory deadlock (Donetsk) unresolved - first round made little progress on core issue
Large forecaster base (874) is slow to move significantly from current level
Exactly at threshold - any positive news pushes above, any negative keeps below
